Generator.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Force Field Generator gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Force Field Generator also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Generator.display_target_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Force Field Generator gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Force Field Generator also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Generator.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Resistance.display_help: Force Field Generator will stay by the side of the Engineer that created it. It is resistant to Sleep, Fear and Taunt.
Resistance.display_target_help: Force Field Generator will stay by the side of the Engineer that created it. It is resistant to Sleep, Fear and Taunt.

Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.
Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_target_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Rifle_Butt.display_help: A quick attack with the butt of a rifle.
Rifle_Butt.display_target_help: A quick attack with the butt of a rifle.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.
Brawl.display_target_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Force_Field_Generator.display_help: Captain Castillo can place a Force Field Generator that can protect all nearby allies.
Force_Field_Generator.display_target_help: Colonel Castillo can place a Force Field Generator that can protect all nearby allies.

Flamethrower.display_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire. You are taking damage over time.
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire. You are taking damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Smoke_Grenade.display_help: The Smoke Grenade envelops all those in the affected area in a cloud of smoke. Most targets will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the targets are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will have a more difficult time hitting you.
Smoke_Grenade.display_target_help: Your visual range and Accuracy have been reduced by the Smoke Grenade.

Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_help: Upon impact, the Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring
Wide_Area_Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Summon_Jumpbot.display_help: Summons a Jumpbot to aid him.
Summon_Jumpbot.display_target_help: Summons 2 Jumpbots to a targeted location.

Kinetic_Shield.display_help: Legendary Foes are resistant to everything.
Kinetic_Shield.display_target_help: Legendary Foes are resistant to everything.
Kinetic_Shield.display_attacker_hit: Legendary Foes are resistant to everything.

Energy_Drain.display_help: Energy Drain leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance and Defense. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance or Defense. Recharge: Long
Energy_Drain.display_target_help: Your Recovery and Regeneration rates have been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: {PowerName} steals some Endurance from {PlayerDest}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} steals some of your Endurance with a {PowerName}.
Your {PowerName} increases your defense!
Your {PowerName} increases your defense!
Your {PowerName} increases your Endurance!

Energy_Transfer.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own pain into a punch that deals extreme smashing and energy damage while healing yourself. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.display_target_help: Your ability to taunt has been increased. You may also have been Disoriented.

Force_Field_Generator.display_help: Sky Raiders Ground troops can place a Force Field Generator that can protect all nearby allies.
Force_Field_Generator.display_target_help: Sky Raiders Ground troops can place a Force Field Generator that can protect all nearby allies.

Resistance.display_help: JumpBots are resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient powers and resistant to psionic damage. They are vulnerable to energy damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Psionics

Explode.display_help: When Jumpbots are destroyed, they tend to explode.
